messages.message:
Facebook User
Greetings and Salutations!

You have been cordially invited to join us in our epic game day TOMORROW (feel special). 

In order to ensure optimal fun and awesomeness, please consider the following:
- Who: you and everyone else
- What: epic games (be ready to run around)
- When: commencement at 1:00. We'll go until we can't go no more
- Where: NEW location at Chaparral Park. See event for address.  
- Why: does it matter?
- How: very carefully

 MONEY! Make sure you have some cash if you want to go out and feast after the games have come to a close.


Hope to see you all there TOMORROW!!!
